## 2.2 Clear Vision

1. The data on a graph are the reason for the existence of the graph.

2. Simplify visuals—use thin lines, light grids.

3. We should eliminate superfluity in graphs.

## 2.3 Superfluity and Standing Out

1. Avoid superfluity—remove clutter and distractions.

2. Ensure important information is standing out.
